experience-text: With years of experience in customer service and sales, I bring a customer-oriented approach to the development of web applications. The goal is to create user-friendly solutions that are intuitive and offer a high user experience. Through an intensive bootcamp, I have learned the latest web technologies, which enable me to develop innovative web applications.
contact-message: If you think I‚Äôd be a good match for your projects, contact me!
check-out: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.
Join-description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
El Pollo Loco-description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
DA-Bubble-description: The project is a Slack clone that allows users to create channels and exchange direct messages.
headline: contact me
about: Contact me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas, and contributing to your projects with my work.
privacy-two: read and agree to the processing of my data according to the provisions.
name: I am Jan Woll
Wir sammeln personenbezogene Daten von B: We collect personal data from visitors to our website when they contact us via the contact form. Providing your name, email address, and the content of your message is required to process your request.
Die von Ihnen bereitgestellten personenb: The personal data you provide will only be used to respond to your inquiries. This information will not be shared with third parties or used for other purposes.
Unsere Website verwendet keine Cookies o: Our website does not use cookies or other tracking technologies to monitor visitors' behavior or collect information about their use of the website.
4. Weitergabe von Informationen an Dritt: 4. Disclosure of Information to Third Parties
Wir geben Ihre personenbezogenen Daten n: We do not disclose your personal data to third parties. Your information remains confidential and is only used for direct communication between you and us.
Wir ergreifen geeignete Ma√ünahmen, um d: We take appropriate measures to ensure the security of your personal information and protect it from unauthorized access, loss, misuse, or alteration. Please note that no data transmission over the internet can be guaranteed to be completely secure, and we cannot ensure the security of data sent to our website.
Da keine Registrierung auf unserer Websi: Since no registration is required on our website, we only collect information provided through the contact form. You have the right to request information about your stored personal data as well as its correction or deletion, as far as legally permissible.
Wenn Sie Fragen zur Nutzung Ihrer Daten: If you have questions about the use of your data or wish to exercise your rights regarding your personal data, please contact us at: Dominik Hucka, Peter√§cker 6, 72581 Dettingen, Germany.
Wir behalten uns das Recht vor, diese Da: We reserve the right to change this privacy policy. We will inform you appropriately of any significant changes. Continued use of our website after such changes constitutes your consent to our updated practices.
